name: Anand M
top_product: Here are some top products related to Water Treatment Services: 1. Reverse Osmosis (RO) Systems 2. Water Filtration Units 3. Sewage Treatment Plants (STPs) 4. Water Softening Systems 5. Industrial Water Treatment Chemicals 6. Domestic Water Purification Systems 7. Drinking Water Treatment Systems 8. Effluent Treatment Plant (ETP) Systems 9. Wastewater Treatment Systems 10. UV Water Purifiers These products are designed to provide clean and safe water for various applications, including industrial, domestic, and drinking water purposes.
ideal_referral: 1 Civil Engineers and contractors 2 Real estate and builders 3 Construction companies 4Government sectors5 Public and private sector units 6Hospitals7Interiors8 Schools, colleges and other educational institutions 9Aquafarms10Renovation works11Electrical contractors12Plumbing contractors13 Network of companies 14 Residential and commerical areas 15Industries
top_problem_solved: Here are some top problems solved: 1. Contaminated water supply: Our products and services help remove impurities and contaminants from water, making it safe for consumption. 2. Scaling and corrosion: Our water softening systems and treatment chemicals help prevent scaling and corrosion in pipes and equipment. 3. Wastewater disposal: Our sewage treatment plants and effluent treatment plant systems help treat and dispose of wastewater in an environmentally friendly manner. 4. Waterborne diseases: Our drinking water treatment systems and UV water purifiers help remove pathogens and bacteria from water, reducing the risk of waterborne diseases. 5. Industrial water treatment challenges: Our industrial water treatment chemicals and systems help address challenges such as corrosion, scaling, and contamination in industrial water treatment processes. 6. Domestic water purification: Our domestic water purification systems help provide clean and safe drinking water for households. 7. Environmental pollution: Our wastewater treatment systems and effluent treatment plant systems help reduce environmental pollution by treating and disposing of wastewater in an environmentally friendly manner. These are just some of the top problems solved by our water treatment products and services.
my_favourite_bni_story: Success

name: Arun Pillai
my_business:
At Endurance Edge, we combine science-based training with holistic wellness to create sustainable results.
Our program focuses on 5 key pillars:
	1.	 Nutrition Coaching – Customized diet plans designed for your fitness goal (fat loss, performance, or endurance).
	2.	 Strength Training – Build muscle strength and mobility to prevent injuries and enhance running efficiency.
	3.	 Yoga & Flexibility – Weekly yoga sessions to improve mobility, posture, and recovery.
	4.	 Mindfulness & Focus – Mental conditioning to improve race mindset and consistency.
	5.	 Running Coaching – Structured running plans from 5K to 21K with pace, endurance, and recovery balance.
top_product: Sustainable Weightloss Service
ideal_referral: Doctors , IT professionals , Fitness enthusisats , Obese individuals
top_problem_solved: Made a client lose 10 kgs in 3 months effectively .

name: Vigneshwar Chandrasekaran
my_business:
At Global Impex, I help global markets fulfil their food product needs by providing 
high-quality Indian products. My focus is on ensuring every item meets strict quality standards and is 
packaged to preserve freshness. I handle all aspects of the export process, from documentation to 
Homely delivery, serving markets in Dubai, Doha, Kuwait, Muscat, Bahrain, Singapore, and Malaysia. 
With a commitment to sustainability and building lasƟng relaƟonships, I strive to connect the world 
with India’s rich agricultural offerings.
top_product: 1. Fresh Indian Fruits & Vegetables ( Both Seasonal and Non Seasonal ) 2. Fresh Coconut and Coconut Products 3. Fresh Indian Spices 4. Pulses and Lentils 5. Fresh Herbs
ideal_referral: 1. International Supermarkets and Hypermarkets 2. Hotel Chains and Restaurant Groups abroad 3. Food Distribution Companies abroad
top_problem_solved: I solve the problem of inconsistent quality and delays in delivering fresh fruits and vegetables. We ensure timely shipments, premium quality, and compliance with food safety standards, helping international buyers maintain a reliable and cost-effective supply of fresh produce.
my_favourite_bni_story: My favourite BNI story reflects the true spirit of Givers Gain. During a BNI training session, I connected with a fellow member and offered insights about the export industry. In return, they introduced me to an international buyer looking for fresh produce. This referral led to a major order from the Middle East, transforming my business. It showed me how giving value to others in BNI creates powerful opportunities in return.
